phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
How did you like that, damn it?!
You are going to spill everything to the Magic Knights,
including who you guys are and what your motives are!
It appears the end has come.
What do you think life is?!
What Happened on a Certain Day in the Castle Town
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
Sounds like you guys went through hell!
Why does he sound so happy about that?
Hey, Captain, I do not think this is a laughing matter.
Being depressed is not going to bring Old Man Seihi back.
It is just as you say, sir.
Old Man Seihi liked to see everyone happy and energetic.
You guys should be laughing, too.
That is how it should be.
What happened to Old Man Seihi really is a shame,
but you three were able to protect the villagers.
You do not even know the Magic Knights' salute?!
Go on, give it a try.
Captain, we went to the Magic Investigation Department.
Who the heck's behind all this?!
I will find their hideout and raid it!
I will beat the crap out of the guy who got away, too!
they investigated the item he left behind,
but still do not have a clue.
But that pocket watch is pretty nice.
Yes, and from what you said about how they were acting,
they were all of very high status.
So they are royalty or nobles.
Oh, who is this little guy?
I will turn you into fried chicken!
I will not let you turn him into fried chicken!
Are you two trying to break the building?!
You are the one breaking everything, though.
It does not matter if the ones behind this are royalty or nobility.
We are going to let the Investigation Department
take care of this, and we will wait for their report.
More importantly, I have got some good news.
Your actions have been acknowledged by the Wizard King himself!
You have been given a star!
Do not get so excited if you do not know what they are!
Stars are awarded by the Wizard King based on our performance.
It is a badge of honor for a man!
There is a lady here, too.
It is a badge of honor for a man and a woman!
The various Magic Knights squads compete to get the most stars.
The number of stars indicates how much work a squad has done.
Speaking of, the Golden Dawn is currently at the top with seventy stars.
How many do the Black Bulls have?
We cannot lose to the Golden Dawn!
finally have a nice, even negative thirty.
We are finally only a hundred away from the Golden Dawn.
It is going to take forever to catch up and beat them!
Should I really be in this squad?
Here is your pay for this month.
There is at least 200,000 yuls here!
I am going to eat lots of yummy things with this!
How much would it take for you to fight me?
I was thinking about buying new clothes for my goddess, my little sister, Marie.
What do you think will look best on her?
Tomorrow's going to be a day off, so do not let it go to waste.
I am going to go on tons of dates!
We should all go out somewhere and have fun.
You could buy at least ten years' worth of tatoes with this money!
Potatoes from Hage Village that taste bland and have a questionable texture.
Sister Lily can make anything taste good!
The woman I am going to marry someday!
But are not sisters women of the cloth?
I do not think they can get married.
I will go beyond all limitations!
What do you plan to do with it?
I-I am going to send some money back to the church in Hage.
That is a great idea, Asta!
That is the manly thing to do!
Do you send money back, too?
Only after I have increased it a hundredfold!
A man's got to take risks!
By man, you must mean moron.
Sending some money back is fine, but do not send it all.
Use a little bit for yourself.
But what should I use it for?
Let us go shopping in the castle town tomorrow.
Sister Lily, how are you doing?
All of the kind senior squad members are taking good care of me.
I told you not to move!
Also, I did really well on my first mission,
and received a star from the Wizard King for my excellent performance.
At this rate, I might be able to become the Wizard King by next month.
I want to become the Wizard King and make this a world where everyone can be happy.
Then I will come for you, so please marry me.
Oh, I just had my first payday, so I am sending you the money.
This is an awesome letter, if I do say so myself.
I wonder if Sister Lily will be moved to tears.
I wonder what he is like...
Have you ever been to the castle town?
I guess royals and nobles would not really have reason to go very often.
I just passed through when I went to take the Magic Knights Entrance Exam.
Then let us have a lot of fun today.
Do you want me to fall?
I cannot stop thinking about him for some reason.
The Clover Kingdom is split between the Noble Realm, where royalty and nobility live,
the Common Realm, where the commoners live,
and the Forsaken Realm, where the peasants live.
The Castle Town of Kikka, where Asta and Yuno took
the Magic Knights Entrance Exam, is in the Common Realm.
I hope I can bring Sister Lily and the kids from the church here someday.
Marie, my goddess, I will be there soon.
I want to see your smiling face as soon as possible.
I am not going to lose this month!
The ultra ultimate super large serving of everything!
I dare you to eat all of it!
I am getting heartburn just watching her.
Do you have some time, miss?
Want to have some tea with me?
Do I look like I have time?
You can bring your kids along.
You actually think they are my kids?!
They are my brother and sister!
I have to hurry home so we can open the shop.
I do not have any time to mess around.
Man, I love tough young ladies.
Miss, want to have some fun with me?
Do not get too far ahead, little boy.
Do not you two want to buy anything?
There are just so many things, I do not know what to get.
Ugh, it is the Black Bulls!
That is the lush witch Vanessa.
Are the cute girl next to her and the little kid also Black Bulls?
It is probably best to stay away.
They are starting to get a bit restless.
Magic Knights being in town helps deter crime.
Not to mention, some fine gentlemen might approach us.
I have bought some healing herbs,
as well as some shique ointment, which acts as a poison antidote.
I bought what I needed, so why do not we go somewhere a bit more quiet?
Is not this just some alley?
It is a bit dangerous, but they have some very effective magical items.
I got some good stuff in.
I will take a look later.
Oh, you do not seem too excited.
I guess I cannot blame you.
Royals and nobles will not set foot in here because of their prejudices.
But you cannot control your magical powers yet, right?
They have items that can help you control your magical powers here.
If you can find an item that is a good fit for you, and adjust your powers,
you might be able to control them.
Why do not we take a look around?
It is really lively over there.
You two are a bit too young to go in there yet.
Amateurs should not spend too much time in there, or it could ruin their lives.
I am going to make my paycheck grow a hundredfold!
I really should not be wasting time here, anyway.
Well, the job's to catch a purse-snatcher.
Is that even a job for a Magic Knight?
But the captain would get real scary if I refused.
You got a problem with that?
I will slice you in two!
I finally managed to join the Magic Knights,
but it is the Green Praying Mantises.
All I do every day is run errands.
When I finally got an actual mission, I got used as bait and almost died.
I am constipated and my hair's thinning.
You could probably use this to stabilize your powers.
Well, just give it a try.
You should not have been walking there!
Well, well, what brings you two down here?
The Black Market is no place for you lovely ladies.
As an elite member of the Magic Knights, I shall guide you out of here.
You did not actually buy that, did you?
I took the Entrance Exam with him.
Ah, you are a member of the Green Praying Mantises.
He is with two beautiful girls?!
They are both members of the Black Bulls, too.
Besides, it is all your fault that I ended up in the Green Praying Mantises.
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
Asta, you have yet to learn the ways of the bah-ha.
This is my chance to make a name for myself!
I am going to catch the thief and get praise from the Wizard King, ha!
Black Clover, Page 12: The Wizard King Saw.
Not giving up is my bah-ha!
